description: Dungeons & Dragons Neverwinter Nights 2: Enhanced Edition launches on July 15 on both PC and consoles, marking the very first time Neverwinter Nights 2 is available on the latter.

description: A Japanese farmer has praised Cow's butt in Mario Kart World for realism in a social media post that has gone viral.
title: Japanese Farmer Praises Cow's Butt in Mario Kart World: 'Honestly, Cow Butts Are About This Mucky'

author: Tom Phillips
description: The upcoming Harry Potter HBO TV series has cast its Draco Malfoy, Lucius Malfoy, Molly Weasley and a number of other roles.
title: Harry Potter HBO TV Series Casts Draco and Lucius Malfoy

author: Ryan McCaffrey
description: The thing that's always bugged me about the previous Jurassic World Evolution games is that they seemed a bit stripped-down compared to what Frontier has shown us is possible with their sister franchises, Planet Zoo and Planet Coaster. So the thing I'm most excited about with Evolution 3 is that it seems like we're finally getting the full Frontier feature set in a Jurassic game.
title: Jurassic World Evolution 3 Lets You Channel Your Inner John Hammond

author: Ryan McCaffrey
description: Now that we've seen MindsEye in action, we have a much clearer picture of what it is and what it hopes to achieve. With that in mind, here are ten things you should know about MindsEye.
title: 10 Things You Should Know About MindsEye, the New Game from Ex-GTA Lead Leslie Benzies

author: Lex Briscuso
description: The new Harry Potter TV series continues to take shape, with more casting announcements for the upcoming HBO series. The Crown star Bertie Carvel, who played former British Prime Minister Tony Blair on the historical drama, is now set to join the Potter cast as Cornelius Fudge, the Minister of Magic. Additionally, Bel Powley and Daniel Rigby will take on the roles of Harry's aunt and uncle, Petunia and Vernon Dursley.
title: The Dursleys and Cornelius Fudge Have Been Cast in Upcoming Harry Potter HBO Series

author: Vikki Blake
description: Konami's hosting a live showcase, Konami Press Start Live, on June 12. Expect more Silent Hill f and Metal Gear Solid Delta: Snake Eater.
title: Konami's Hosting a Metal Gear Solid Delta: Snake Eater and Silent Hill f Livestream Later This Week — Here's What To Expect

author: Jordan Sirani
description: Wondering how to play the Resident Evil games in order? We're here to help break down the chronology of Capcom's survival horror franchise.
title: How to Play the Resident Evil Games in Chronological Order

author: NormanOsborn
description: At IGN Live, Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 3 + 4 game director, Kurt Tillmanns, was on hand to talk about what this collection has to offer in terms of mixing new and old elements - including one bright green new inclusion in the form of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtle's resident party dude, Michaelangelo.
title: Tony Hawk Pro Skater 3 + 4 Director on Including a Ninja Turtle and a Surreal Pinball Park | IGN Live 2025

author: Tom Phillips
description: Nintendo has delayed the launch of its upcoming live-action The Legend of Zelda movie, the company has just confirmed.
title: Nintendo Delays Live-Action The Legend of Zelda Movie

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Microsoft has announced via Xbox Live Japan that the remaster of the first Gears of War game, Gears of War: Reloaded, will not get a Japanese PS5 release. However, the title will still come to Xbox Series X and S, Xbox PC, Game Pass, and PC via Steam in Japan this August.
title: Gears of War: Reloaded Skips PS5 Release in Japan Due to 'Platform Policies'

author: Rebekah Valentine
description: 007: First Light. Project Fantasy. MindsEye. IO Interactive has a lot going on in the coming days, months, and years. But one key franchise of theirs has been conspicuously quiet: Hitman. Even so, CEO Hakan Abrak says the developer isn't done with Agent 47.
title: Hitman Series Is 'Definitely Not Done,' Insists IO Interactive CEO

author: Tom Phillips
description: Mario Kart World's credits don't feature Nintendo's most famous designer, Shigeru Miyamoto, creator of Mario himself. But as fans who complete the game spot Miyamoto's absence, others have pointed to his changed role of late as something of an explanation.
title: Nintendo Fans Spot Shigeru Miyamoto Missing From Mario Kart World Credits — but It Isn't Too Much of a Surprise

author: Vikki Blake
description: The Last of Us Season 2 has been and gone, and though most of us who played the second game knew what was coming, it seems many viewers did not — and showrunner Craig Mazin says he's still getting bewildered fans asking: "Why did you kill Pedro Pascal?"
title: Last of Us TV Series Showrunner Wants You To Know He Didn't Kill Anyone In Real Life: 'The Actor Is Alive And He's In Literally Everything Else'

author: Erik Adams
description: Celine Song follows up the Oscar-nominated Past Lives with a meaningful, introspective drama about self-worth.
title: Materialists Review

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: John Wick director Chad Stahelski has revealed he was initially against Keanu Reeves appearing in spin-off Ballerina, but understood why it needed to happen: to give the movie a "fighting chance."
title: Chad Stahelski Was 'Against' Keanu Reeves Popping Up in John Wick Spin-Off Ballerina, but Wanted to Give It a 'Fighting Chance'

author: Tom Phillips
description: Nintendo has hidden a cool Easter egg to the GameCube within Switch 2, fans have discovered.
title: Nintendo Switch 2 Hides Cool GameCube Easter Eggs You Can Unlock With Just a Few Button Presses

author: Vikki Blake
description: GOG has announced a new One-Click Mod system, with the Skyblivion mod for The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim coming later in 2025.
title: GOG Announces New One-Click Mod System, Skyblivion Mod for The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim Coming This Year

author: Tom Phillips
description: The original ending for Doctor Who's just-finished second season — which now concludes with Ncuti Gatwa's departure and the sudden arrival of Billie Piper — has seemingly been confirmed by the TikTok account of an actor who appeared in the finale.
title: Doctor Who Actor Seemingly Confirms Finale's Original Ending Plans — Before Those Reshoots Due to Ncuti Gatwa's Departure

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Henry Cavill has said he’s enjoying the challenge of adapting what he called the "tricky" and “very complex” Warhammer 40,000 tabletop game.
title: Henry Cavill Says He's Enjoying the Challenge of Creating the Warhammer 40,000 Cinematic Universe: 'It Is a Tricky IP, and a Very Complex IP, and That's What I Love About It'

author: Vikki Blake
description: Atlus finally revealed Persona 4 Revival, a remake of the beloved Persona 4. But not everyone liked what they saw in the 40-second trailer.
title: P-Studio Director 'Confident' Persona 4 Revival Will Be 'Fresh and Surprising'

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Microsoft announced Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 at its Xbox Games Showcase June 2025, a reveal that came later in the year than is usual for the series. And the debut trailer, below, gave fans little to go on beyond a story tease and confirmation of the year in which the game is set (2035) and its protagonist: David Mason.
title: Activision Says It's Doing Almost No Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 Pre-Promotion: 'We're Setting This Up More Like a Beyonce Album Dropping'

author: Vikki Blake
description: Rebel Wolves — the studio led by former The Witcher 3 game director and co-director for Cyberpunk 2077, Konrad Tomaszkiewicz — has confirmed its upcoming dark fantasy action-RPG, The Blood of Dawnwalker, will release in 2026. And there's a new trailer, too.
title: Former The Witcher 3 Director Shows Off New Footage of Dark Fantasy Adventure The Blood of Dawnwalker

author: Tom Phillips
description: The developer of Hollow Knight: Silksong has addressed the game's brief appearance yesterday at Microsoft's Xbox Games Showcase 2025, when it popped up alongside the new ROG Ally X handheld.
title: Hollow Knight: Silksong Developer Responds to Release Date Confusion, Promises Launch 'Before Holiday,' Not Tied to Xbox Handheld Arrival

author: Adam Bankhurst
description: One of the big reveals from the Xbox Showcase was that Invincible VS is on its way, and we were able to chat with members of Skybounds's Quarter Up at IGN Live to learn why this 3v3 fighting game is giving Robert Kirkman's superhero epic the tag fighter it deserves, complete with Killer Instinct influences.
title: Invincible VS Creators on Killer Instinct Influences, Authenticity, Why Its a 3v3 Tag Fighter, and More - IGN Live 2025

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: There were a number of high-profile no-shows from the Xbox Games Showcase. State of Play 3, for example, failed to turn up. The Perfect Dark reboot was conspicuous by its absence. But perhaps Starfield’s ongoing M.I.A. status hurts the most — at least for long-suffering fans of the game.
title: After Starfield's Xbox No-Show, Even Its Most Loyal Fans Are Starting to Worry: 'Bethesda Makes It So Hard to Defend This Game'

author: Erik Adams
description: The live-action How to Train Your Dragon can feel hemmed in by its faithfulness to the animated original, but it’s re-creating that film’s sense of heart and soul as well as its entire plot and most enduring images.
title: How to Train Your Dragon Review
